name: Headspace for Educators
description: Free Headspace Premium subscription for K-12 teachers ($69.99 value)
fullDescription: Headspace offers free access to K-12 teachers in the US, providing meditation, sleep, and mindfulness exercises to support educator well-being.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free Headspace subscription for K-12 teachers
- Guided meditations
- Sleep sounds and exercises
- Stress and anxiety tools
- Focus music and exercises
- Normally $69.99/year value
howToGetIt:
1. Visit headspace.com/educators
2. Verify K-12 teacher status through SheerID
3. Create free Headspace account
4. Access full premium content
5. Must be actively employed K-12 educator in US
keywords: Headspace, teacher, educator, free, meditation, mindfulness, mental health, K-12, stress relief
